creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: soft skullcap embroidered in long stitches; tan red and gold thread form abstract shapes; small peak at top with tassel; tassel with blue and white beads attached to bottom edge
dimension: 5 x 6 1/4 x 6 1/4 in. (12.7 x 15.88 x 15.88 cm) (without tassel)
title: Hat
